name: Perfectly Fine - eBook (digital)
description:
Click for a Free Download - Limited Time

Digital Downoad Includes: eBook Version PDF Version 130 Pages Curated by Dave McCormack Perfectly Fine started in 2012 as a Facebook group chronicling abandoned mattresses that are still Perfectly Fine. In a short space of time the group has managed to capture images of hundreds of mattresses from around the world. Volume one documents the first 122 photographs of mattresses, all of them... Perfectly Fine. This is the digital version, the printed version is available at Blurb Books. Perfectly Fine Facebook Group Compiled by Daniel Smith Front cover design by Kel McIntosh Preview
Perfectly Fine by Dave McCormack | Make Your Own Book

name: gerantgerant Archives I - Digital Version
description: __ pages Download Includes: eBook version (e-reader, iPad & iPhone compatible) PDF (compatible with computers and most devices) To read the eBook on a computer download Calibre for free. This book selectively archives hundreds of videos uploaded to YouTube by Gerant Kenneth between 2007 and the start of 2013. One still is taken from each video, downloaded from YouTube's thumbnails. Videos are displayed chronologically. Gerant's videos are art house extravaganzas, music, telemarketer pranks, comedy, gigs, vlogs and general mayhem. Gerant on Youtube This is not an exit. True Variety - The Real Thing Witness the drama, action, melody and romance. Behold the crying and laughter. Pranks, vlogging, original music and art house extravaganzas... - Gerant Kenneth Available Digital Download - ePub and PDF View the printed versions here. Gerant's photo blog - Day In Day Out Of Time

name: Fetish - A digital catalogue curated by Jane Robinson.
description: Options Digital Download Only: $5.00 An 158 page catalogue curated and compiled by Jane Robinson. This is the catalogue from an exhibition titled Fetish held in July 2012. Nine artists respond to Fetish - an exhibition at Podspace gallery Newcastle. Read more on Soft Space Tumblr Digital Delivery - ePub suitable for most ebook readers and iPad/iPhone. PDF available on request. Artists Leonie Andrews Sally Dooner Sarah Jones Gina McDonald Sylvia Ray Eleanor Jane Robinson Daniel Smith Rose Turner Clare Weeks With a forward by Gillean Shaw

name: Emergency Death Pill - Small - Printed book by Jonathan McBurnie
description:
Delve into the mind of artist and cult hero Jonathan McBurnie in a book of drawings from his sketch books. The works were personally selected by Jonathan McBurnie from two of his 2012 sketchbooks. A mix of heroes, villains, pop culture references, phrases, lists, cowboys, nude figures and faces. A look into an artistâs sketch book provides a wonderful insight into their artistic and thought processes. Size: 5x8â Pages: 64 Cover: Softcover Delivery: 3-14 days worldwide Options -Black & White Pulp Paper -Colour This book reproduces some of the choicest cuts from two journals of mine that were filled more or less in tandem. I will often have several journals in various sizes, uses and stages of completion. I find this a necessary practice in relation to the way I go about forming an image or set of images in my mind before I ever put ink on paper. My journals will fill with vague sketches, life drawings, absent-minded default doodles, phone numbers, failed experiments, bad poetry, forgotten appointments, possible titles, old passwords, snatches of overheard conversations, neat phrases and compositional collage. In retrospect, journals can be incredibly revealing of the time they were made, or else puzzling and cryptic. I hope you enjoy their secrets. - Jonathan McBurnie August 2012 jonathanmcburnie.com There are three version of the book available:
  • Digital Version
  • 5x8"Printed Softcover Version
  • 8x10"Printed Softcover Version
Drawings by Jonathan McBurnie. Compiled by Daniel Smith. All images are copyright Jonathan McBurnie. Book layout & design copyright Daniel Smith & Soft Space Collect.

name: Little Stages Book
description: A book of photographs of dioramas by Daniel Smith and Justine Glover. Pre-order now. The book will be released soon. Little Stages on Tumblr

name: I'm the Jail Madness: Book #1 by Daniel Smith
description:
This is the first in a new series of books/zines filled with drawings by Daniel Smith. The first book's theme is horror. Coffins, crosses, demons, devils, blood spatter, bones and teeth. This is a short book to start, with longer ones to follow.

Includes a free ePub digitally downloadable version (works on iPad/iPhone).

Check out a full preview at http://www.blurb.com/books/2837964

All I'm the Jail Madness books are softcover and 5x8". Upcoming themes/issues include Graphic Novels, Amateurs, Boys and Girls, Photographs, Death, Love, and Hate Poetry.

5 by 8 inches
32 pages

name: Dare Devils and Other Demons - Printed Book and Ebook by Chas Glover
description:
This book of paintings by Chas Glover is a softcover 8x10" book printed on a gloss paper. The paintings are from a recent series of work created in 2011. There are sixty pages. The book, when purchased through this store, includes a free ebook download in ePub format (suitable for i devices). To preview the book and purchase the book in a variety of paper types and in hard cover, have a look on blurb.com - http://bit.ly/tj8mVH
Dare Devils and Other Demons by Chas Glover & Soft Space Collect | Make Your Own Book

name: Drawing Time Book (printed version)
description:
A book of works by multiple artists. Also available direct from Blurb Books - http://www.blurb.com/bookstore/detail/2428579?ce=blurb_ew&utm_source=widget 

Artists featured include Grant Hunter, Tobius Miller, Joel Beerden, Amanda Kenneth, Jo-Ann Cahill, gerant, Daniel Smith, Anastasia Freeman, Bran Sinclair, Taryn Raffan, Sarah Mould, Daniel Tanner, Eleanor Jane Robinson, Patrycja Nedziak, Eduardo Wolfe-Alegria, and Kel Macintosh.
